articles.title: 34 Products You Should Buy Now If You Want Your Home Clean And Tidy All Year Long
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various new cleaning and organization products, including a cleaning paste, storage solutions, and cleaning tools. These products aim to make household chores easier and more efficient, and enhance home organization.

articles.title: Plug.ng: Revolutionizing Bill Payments in Nigeria
articles.author: Oladosu Michael
articles.summary: Plug.ng, a new fintech platform, has launched in Nigeria to provide affordable and accessible bill payment solutions. The platform offers services such as airtime purchase, data subscription, electricity bill payment, education payments, virtual cards and a unique auto-renew feature, alongside a dedicated agent dashboard with a reward system. Plug.ng aims to transform how Nigerians manage their finances by offering a user-centric design and seamless bill payment experience.

articles.title: 32 Beauty Products To Make You Triple-Check The Price
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Wet n Wild introduces a long-lasting lipstick and a lightweight tinted hydrator. Sol de Janeiro promotes its Bum Bum Cream, while Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Other new products include Laura Geller's Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation, Essence's Volume Booster Lash Primer, Biodance's Real Deep sheet mask and E.l.f's Camo concealer.

articles.title: Vogue's AI Guess Models Explained: Interview
articles.author: Natasha Jokic
articles.summary: Guess utilized AI-generated models from Seraphinne Vallora in their August Vogue advertisement for a chevron dress. This collaboration allowed Guess to expedite campaign production and reduce costs associated with traditional photoshoots, using AI for a marketing campaign. Seraphinne Vallora offers services, including AI twins of real-life models.

articles.title: Cordless vacuum with 12,700 5-star reviews now just $78; offers Dyson-like features
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: PrettyCare introduces the W200 cordless vacuum as a more affordable alternative to Dyson. The PrettyCare W200 features a 180W motor with up to 28Kpa suction, a 6-stage filtration system, and a lightweight design with up to 48 minutes of cleaning time. Currently, the PrettyCare W200 is on sale at Walmart for $78.99, originally $400.

articles.title: Survive NYC summer nights with sheets that actually breathe
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: StackCommerce introduces a bamboo-blend sheet set designed to regulate body temperature and provide comfortable sleep, especially during hot weather. The sheet set, made from a blend of microfiber and bamboo fiber, is ultra-soft and odor-resistant. It is available at a promotional price of $29.99.

articles.title: VERSES¬Æ Featured in IEEE Spectrum  Jul. 25, 2025 20:47
articles.summary: VERSES AI's vision of the Spatial Web has been featured in IEEE Spectrum, highlighting the potential of their Genius platform to interconnect devices, robots, and AI agents. The Spatial Web standards will enable quicker development, deployment, and lower integration costs for Genius customers.

articles.title: Nivalis: A Cyberpunk Slice-of-Life Sim Launches Spring 2025
articles.author: Alfredo Robelo
articles.summary: Developer ION LANDS, published by 505 Games, is launching Nivalis, a first-person cyberpunk life simulation, on PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store in Spring 2025. The game allows players to build a business empire from operating a noodle stand to bars and nightclubs in a neon-soaked metropolis.

articles.title: Google's Opal: Test Vibe-Coding App
articles.summary: Google has launched Opal, an AI-powered tool that enables users to create mini web applications using text prompts. Available for testing through Google Labs, Opal offers a visual workflow editor, allowing users to understand and modify the AI's creation process. This aims to democratize app development, empowering individuals without coding experience to rapidly prototype and deploy digital solutions.

articles.title: Philly's first Amazon Fresh supermarket to open in a few weeks
articles.author: Erin McCarthy
articles.summary: Amazon Fresh stores offer a unique shopping experience where Amazon Prime members can use an app to fill their cart and walk out. Non-members can also shop at these locations. Amazon Fresh aims to provide high-quality grocery items at great value, with locations available in various regions.

articles.title: Launch Windows Apps on Android: A Redesigned Experience
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft is rolling out a significant update to its Link to Windows service for Android, introducing a refreshed interface and the 'Recent Activity' feature for seamless access to transferred files and clipboard content. The update also enhances device monitoring with real-time insights into PC battery level and Wi-Fi connection status, plus remote PC locking capabilities. Additionally, the ability to run Windows apps on Android devices has evolved significantly, offering users increased flexibility and productivity using methods like Remote Desktop Applications, App Virtualization and Windows Subsystem for Android (WSA).

articles.title: The World's Greatest Digital Watch Just Got a Classy Update
articles.author: Johnny Brayson
articles.summary: A. Lange & S√∂hne has introduced the Zeitwerk Date Pink Gold, a new model in the Zeitwerk line. This version features a pink gold case and retains the innovative digital display showing hours and minutes via discs. The watch builds upon the 2019 Zeitwerk Date, which debuted a thinner movement and added a date complication.

articles.title: Byte-Sized AI: Google's User Try-On Goes Live; Nike Beta Tests In-App Conversational AI
articles.summary: Nike is beta testing NikeAI, an in-app AI assistant for iOS users, to help consumers find products based on their needs. Google launched a virtual try-on tool where users can upload photos to see how garments would look on them, along with an AI-enabled press tracking tool for price alerts on specific items.

articles.title: Byte-Sized AI: Google's User Try-On Goes Live; Nike Beta Tests In-App Conversational AI
articles.author: Meghan Hall
articles.summary: Nike is beta testing NikeAI, a new AI-powered feature on its iOS app that allows consumers to inquire about specific gear and find products based on color and size preferences. Google has launched a virtual try-on tool allowing users to see how garments look on themselves using personal photos, and has also rolled out an AI-enabled press tracking tool to alert consumers when products reach their desired price. Lumotive has reopened its Series B round to allow Amazon's Industrial Innovation Fund and ITHCA Group for production of chips that help industrial machinery.

articles.title: IMM Unveils Superbrand Awards to Recognize Top Performers Across Sectors
articles.summary: The Institute of Marketing in Malawi (IMM) has launched the Superbrand Awards, a new research-based initiative to recognize outstanding brands based on customer feedback. This customer-centric award focuses on customer service, overall experience, and how well the brand serves its intended purpose, providing brands with an opportunity to be recognized by a credible institution.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G powered by a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC launched in India, Know details
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G in India for Rs 9999, featuring 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, and color options like Golden Mist and Midnight Mist. Available on Amazon from August 1, it includes launch offers such as bank discounts and exchange bonuses. The device boasts a 6.74-inch HD+ display, Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC, and a 50MP AI-powered primary camera.

articles.title: How First-Time Sellers Are Leveraging Tech To Sell Faster
articles.author: Anna Baluch
articles.summary: Real estate agents are leveraging AI tools like ChatGPT, AI-powered staging, and Canva's AI Suite to enhance property listings, create virtual staging, and produce marketing materials. These technologies allow for emotionally compelling descriptions, visually appealing presentations, and efficient marketing, ultimately aiming to expedite the home selling process.

articles.title: NYC's First 'Dirty Soda' Shop, Cool Sips, Reviewed
articles.author: Buzz Feed
org: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
articles.summary: Cool Sips, a dirty soda shop, has introduced its services to NYC. The shop offers a variety of flavored soda combinations, including options like the Dewey (Starry Lemon-Lime, pineapple, and coconut) and the Tybee (Orange Gatorade, strawberry, vanilla cream, and strawberry jellies). Cool Sips aims to provide a refreshing alternative to traditional coffee shops.

articles.title: ËøôÊòØÂè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™Á≥ªÂàóÔºå‰πüÊòØÊòéÂ§©Êôö‰∏äÁ∫ΩÁ∫¶Êó∂Èó¥22Ôºö00ÊúâÔºå Pop Mart App
articles.summary: The "ÂèØ‰πêlabubu" (Cola Labubu) series, a new product from ÂèØ‰πê (Cola), is now available. This series doesn't feature fur. A user added the product to their cart but didn't complete the purchase.

articles.title: I Asked A Machine To Find My Signature Scent ‚Äî & I Might've Found It
articles.author: Rebecca Fearn
articles.summary: EveryHuman has launched Algorithmic Perfumery, an AI-guided service that allows users to create unique fragrances. The process involves answering questions that help the AI match the user with suitable scent combinations, followed by personalized scent vials delivered by mail and a follow-up consultation with a perfumer. This service aims to democratize fragrance creation, allowing individuals to create scents that reflect their personal preferences and provides a more accessible and custom approach to fragrance.

articles.title: Sheetz opens rebuilt Schuylkill Haven store
articles.author: Ron Devlin
articles.summary: Sheetz reopened its rebuilt convenience store on Route 61, featuring a larger 6,130-square-foot space and offering diesel fuel at every pump. The store replaced the previous location after demolition and reconfiguration.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventors Develop Portable Car Washing System (NJR-221)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: Inventors created the SMART CAR WASH to provide a portable way to wash and rinse vehicles. The SMART CAR WASH enhances the car washing experience.

articles.title: I tested the $2,000 Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 for a week, and I wish I loved it more
articles.author: Henry T. Casey
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone featuring a thinner design, an 8-inch AMOLED display, and long battery life. The phone is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy processor and includes generative AI tools. The Z Fold 7 starts at $2,000 for the 256GB configuration, with a temporary offer to upgrade to 512GB at the same price.

articles.title: National Lipstick Day is here ‚Äî shop these can't-miss deals to get the perfect pout
articles.author: Nicole Iuzzolino
articles.summary: MAC, Gisou and Pat McGrath are offering discounted prices on their lipstick products from July 23-29 for National Lipstick Day. A popular Pat McGrath Labs Lipstick is also on sale at Nordstrom.

articles.title: From SEO to Social Ads: Where AI Fits in the Modern Marketing Funnel
articles.author: Amber Smith
articles.summary: AI-driven marketing tools such as Surfer SEO and Clearscope assist in SEO optimization by discovering high-impact keywords and identifying site errors. Platforms like Google Ads and Meta Ads utilize smart bidding to optimize ad spend, while AI writing tools like SurghGraph and Jasper speed up content creation. Moreover, AI can analyze user behavior to personalize content and predict customer churn, enhancing customer retention strategies.

articles.title: It's Qwen's summer: new open source Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507 tops OpenAI, Gemini reasoning models on key benchmarks
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Alibaba's Qwen Team launched Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507, an updated reasoning large language model (LLM). The model leads in AIME25 benchmark and shows commanding performance on LiveCodeBench v6, surpassing prior versions and competitors.

articles.title: Equator Unveils Stackable Marine Washer-Dryer Set Engineered for Life at Sea
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Equator Advanced Appliances has released a new product: a Stackable Marine Washer-Dryer Set engineered for life at sea. This product introduction aims to provide a space-saving and convenient laundry solution for marine environments.

articles.title: Samsung tri fold reveal packs next gen Galaxy S25 flagship chip
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new foldable phone that opens twice to reveal a larger display. The design aims to blend portability and productivity, creating a new category between phone and tablet, reinventing the foldable technology.

articles.title: HCLTech Fuels Middle Eastern Customer Experience Revolution with Generative AI
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: HCLTech is launching Generative AI (GenAI) solutions in the Middle East to revolutionize customer experience. These solutions include AI-powered chatbots, hyper-personalization engines, automated content creation, and predictive analytics, targeting sectors like banking, retail, and telecommunications. Case studies highlight the successful implementation and positive impacts on customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

articles.title: The Robots and Drones Making Food Delivery Better, Faster and Cheaper
articles.author: Conor Grant
articles.summary: Panera is introducing a drone delivery service for its strawberry lemonade.

articles.title: 'Powerful' pressure washer makes grubby patios 'spotless'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Yimbly is offering a discount on the High-performance Power Washer 1800w. Other pressure washers mentioned are Durhand's High-performance Power Washer 1800w, JML Starlyf Power Pressure Washer and Stream's Pressure Washer Jet Washer. The Durhand pressure washer has a 1800W motor and 150 bar pressure and the Stream model features an adjustable nozzle.

articles.title: Budget cordless vacuum with 'similar features to Dyson' costs ¬£66
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: The Kalado Cordless Vacuum Cleaner KCV01 is available on Amazon with a 17% discount, priced at ¬£66.62. The vacuum weighs 2kg, features a five-stage filtration system, LED display, and comes with various accessories. Alternatives include the Shark Anti Hair Wrap and Hoover Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, which are also being offered with specific features and pricing.

articles.title: The best Amazon deals this weekend: Score rare sales on Apple, Waterpik, KitchenAid and more
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on various products this weekend. The deals include a mini chainsaw for $30 (down from $70), a dual-basket 10-quart Ninja air fryer for $160 (down from $250), and a Craftsman hand vac with a $40 discount.

articles.title: Amazon Expands Its Kindle Colorsoft Lineup With a Cheaper Model‚Äîand One for Kids
articles.summary: Amazon has launched two new Kindle models, including the Kindle Colorsoft Kids edition. The Kindle Colorsoft Kids includes parental controls to manage content and reading progress, adjust age filters, and set bedtimes.

articles.title: Orlando Magic RISK everything on by-committee approach
articles.summary: KENS 5 requires its application to stream content on your phone. The KENS 5 app is necessary to stream KENS 5.

articles.title: Never go digging again! This drawstring makeup bag from Amazon lays everything out on the table
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Lay-n-Go has introduced the Cosmo Drawstring Cosmetic & Makeup Bag Organizer, a flat-lying bag that cinches into a compact pouch. Available in multiple sizes and designs, the water-resistant and machine-washable Cosmo features a zippered pocket and brush holder to contain beauty products.

articles.title: The ‚Ç¨14.99 Lidl Ireland buy that will keep your home smelling amazing ‚Äì it comes with lavender oil & lasts weeks
articles.author: Jamie Smith
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland is launching new products including the Silvercrest Aroma Diffuser for ‚Ç¨14.99, designed to create a fragrant atmosphere with a built-in timer and lavender essential oil; the Smart Tag for ‚Ç¨9.99, to locate valuables; and the SILVERCREST Mini Desk Fan for ‚Ç¨19.99, featuring speed settings and LED mood lighting.

articles.title: VAPORESSO Unveils World's First All-Category Compatible Vaping Product iMate OS at CHAMPS 2025 in Las Vegas
articles.author: VAPORESSO
articles.summary: VAPORESSO introduced iMate OS, the vaping industry's first all-category compatible modular vaping product, at the CHAMPS Trade Summer Show 2025 in Las Vegas. iMate OS combines intelligent recognition with a modular structure, intended to overcome compatibility limitations within the vaping market.

articles.title: Harrisburg food company named one of top emerging brands in the nation
articles.author: Sue Gleiter
articles.summary: Nicobi Foods' ethnic-inspired seasonings and sauces, including Soul Dust seasoning, are now available in hundreds of Walmart stores. The company is also planning to launch a new podcast called "Boss Talk" focused on food, care, and life.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ Is Half the Cost of an iPad Right Now
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab A9+ in October 2023 as the most current model in its A-Series tablet line. This tablet is a budget-focused alternative to the S-Series, offering adequate performance for browsing, email, and light gaming at a more affordable price point.

articles.title: ‚ÄòGamechanger': Boise soap company uses goat milk in skincare products üêêüßº
articles.author: Anna Daly
articles.summary: Clay and Goat Soap Co. introduced goat milk-based skincare products, including soap bars priced at $9.95. The products use goat milk sourced from Idaho Farms, along with organic oils and clays, to help soothe and improve sensitive or dry skin. Customers can purchase the soap online and at the Boise Farmer's Market.

articles.title: Our favourite lip balms for dry, chapped lips
articles.author: Truc Nguyen
articles.summary: The article introduces seven lip balms: Weleda Skin Food Nourishing Lip Butter, Burt's Bees Ultra Conditioning Lip Balm, Peptide Lip Treatment from Rhode, Sun Bum Sunscreen Lip Balm, Laneige Lip Glowy Balm, Buxom Power-full Plump Lip Balm, and Carmex Classic Lip Balm, highlighting their features, ingredients, and benefits. These products range in price and are available at various retailers like Amazon, Sephora, and Well.ca.

articles.title: Amazon launches cheaper 16GB Kindle Colorsoft and new Kids edition
articles.author: Gayathri Kallukaran
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Kindle Colorsoft with 16GB storage for ¬£192, featuring a 7-inch colour E Ink display and eight-week battery life. The Kindle Colorsoft Kids edition, priced at ¬£208, includes a Kids+ subscription and educational tools. Both models are currently available and include a three-month Kindle Unlimited subscription.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: Is it worth Dh7,599?
articles.author: Husain Rizvi
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a slimmer and lighter foldable phone with improved features and Galaxy AI integration. It features a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, up to 16GB RAM, and a versatile camera system, with prices starting from Dh7,599. The phone aims to enhance productivity and creativity.

articles.title: Click. Type. Launch. Figma's AI App Builder Goes Public
articles.summary: Figma is launching its AI-powered app building tool to the public, previously offered in beta. This technology aims to change how digital products are developed for developers, designers, and non-tech teams.

articles.title: From village dreams to global scoops: How Dumont Creamery put Andhra Pradesh on the ice cream map
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: Dumont Creamery, starting as a small family unit, has expanded its reach with unique flavors and a high-capacity plant producing up to 3,000 liters of ice cream per hour. The company's overseas journey includes 10 outlets in the United States, with plans for 25 more by 2026.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon launched with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor and 5,000mAh battery: Price, offers and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Lava has launched its new smartphone, the Blaze Dragon, powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2, with a 50MP AI camera and stock Android 15. The phone will be available from August 1, 2025, exclusively on Amazon, at an introductory price of Rs 8,999 with bank offers and exchange discounts.

articles.title: KNUST researchers develop fish sausage and nuggets from Supaku
org: Department of Fisheries and Watershed Management
Department of Food Science and Technology
articles.summary: The Department of Fisheries and Watershed Management, collaborating with KNUST, has developed fish sausages and nuggets from African bonytongue fish (Supaku). These ready-to-cook products, created under the iPAG project, are undergoing preparations for introduction to local markets, offering a convenient and healthier protein alternative.

articles.title: New ChatGPT Agent AI Is Now Available To Pro Users Worldwide
articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT Agent, a new AI agent that combines existing ChatGPT functionalities, including web browsing and deep research capabilities. It's available to ChatGPT Pro, Plus, and Team users, with varying message limits based on their subscription. Users can interact with the agent and see its actions live, though initial access was limited due to high demand.

articles.title: 36 Products To Help Solve Annoying Body Problems
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Catrice introduces "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a tinted concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter to reduce dark circles. Laneige launches Neo Blurring Powder with blue hyaluronic acid for matte-ifying skin in a travel-friendly case. Cosrx promotes Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence for treating skin problems like acne and fine lines.

articles.title: Nectar Life Expands to Downtown Disney District at the Disneyland Resort
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nectar Life opened its eleventh U.S. location in the Downtown Disney District at Disneyland Resort on July 25, 2025. The new store features a custom blending bar for personalized fragrances in products like shea body butters and fragrance roll-ons, plus a customization bar for milkshake bath soaks and whipped soap.

articles.title: Blue Agave Functional Medicine opens 2nd New Braunfels location
articles.author: Amira Van Leeuwen
articles.summary: Blue Agave Functional Medicine opened a new practice within the New Braunfels MarketPlace shopping center on June 23, introducing its functional medicine services to the community.

articles.title: Unofficial Pixel Watch 4 renders leak, and show off a weird new charging system
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google is preparing to unveil its next smartwatch. This suggests a forthcoming launch or introduction of a new product by Google.

articles.title: VERSES¬Æ Featured in IEEE Spectrum
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: VERSES AI Inc. and its CEO, Gabriel Ren√©, are featured in IEEE Spectrum discussing the Spatial Web. New standards are expected to improve the interconnection of devices and AI agents for VERSES' product Genius‚Ñ¢, promising quicker development, deployment, and reduced integration costs for its customers.

articles.title: Amazon expands Kindle Colorsoft lineup with cheaper model and Kids Edition: Details
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced a new, more affordable Kindle Colorsoft with 16GB storage priced at $249.99 and a Kindle Colorsoft Kids edition for $269.99. The Kids edition includes a year of Amazon Kids Plus and offers features tailored for young readers, while the standard model retains core features like a high-contrast color display and adjustable warm lighting. Both devices are available for purchase in the US.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold7: Powerful Versatility in the Thinnest, Lightest Z Fold Yet
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring a thinner design, an improved 200MP camera, and multimodal AI capabilities. The Galaxy Z Fold7 introduces One UI 8 on Android 16 and Gemini Live on-device AI agent. It offers an enhanced user experience with its wider cover display and lighter build compared to previous models.

articles.title: Coca-Cola's ‚Äòhealthier' soda may upend beloved Jewish tradition
articles.author: Ynet
articles.summary: Coca-Cola unveiled a premium product following Trump's call for 'real sugar' Coke.

articles.title: Google's Opal: A Vibe-Coding Experiment
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google has introduced Opal, a new AI-powered tool being tested through Google Labs, enabling users to generate mini web applications from simple text prompts. Opal allows users to create new applications or remix existing ones, leveraging Google AI models and a visual workflow editor. Once built, applications can be easily deployed and shared, broadening app development to a more general audience.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G launched in India for Rs 9,999
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone in India, priced at Rs 9,999. The phone features a 6.74-inch HD+ 120Hz display, Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, a 50MP primary camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging. It will be available for purchase on Amazon starting August 1.

articles.title: The blingy Huawei Freebuds 6 blend an open fit with convincing noise cancelling ‚Äì does it work?
articles.author: Tom Morgan-Freelander
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Freebuds 6, semi-open fit earbuds priced at ¬£120. These earbuds feature active noise cancellation (ANC), dual drivers, high-quality Bluetooth codecs, and a streamlined design for comfort. The Freebuds 6 offer energetic audio, decent noise cancelling for open-fit earbuds, and a long-lasting battery life with a charging case.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G With120Hz Display Launched In India: Price, Offers, Specifications
articles.author: Rahul M
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G, a new budget 5G smartphone. It features a 6.74-inch display with 120Hz refresh rate, a 50-megapixel AI rear camera, 8-megapixel front camera, UFS 3.1 storage, and a 5000mAh battery with 18W fast charging. The introductory price is Rs. 8,999 during Amazon's Great Freedom Festival.

articles.title: HKEX to launch a new platform in 2026 to improve communication with issuers
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing (0388) is launching a new web-based service.

articles.title: Zong continues nationwide cloud showcase
articles.summary: Zong held a Z SAIS Cloud showcase event in Islamabad, announcing new partnerships with Cymax Technologies, Pak Gulf, and Appologix. This event signals an expansion of Zong's cloud ecosystem and their commitment to providing business-ready solutions for enterprises.

articles.title: Aldi Is Gifting Bachelorette Bundles to Brides This Month
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the "XO, Aldi Bachelorette Bundle," a free bundle targeting bachelorettes in Las Vegas, Miami, Nashville, New Orleans, or Phoenix. The bundle includes Aldi brand koozies, temporary tattoos, hydration sticks, bubbly prebiotic soda, popcorn, cookie thins, and a gift card to Aldi. Fans can claim the bundle via XOALDI.com on July 29 for deliveries in August.

articles.title: 9 Accessories That Will Protect Your Electronics From Summer Heat And Sun
articles.author: Emily Laurence
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a thermal phone case made from NASA spacesuit material, designed to protect phones from heat and water damage. Additionally, Amazon provides a Kindle cover that preserves battery life by automatically turning the device on and off, along with screen protection. Furthermore, Amazon is selling a cooling fan designed to quickly cool down phones that are overheating.

articles.title: Singtel spearheads data centre hiring drive for over 500 positions
articles.author: Tay Hong Yi
articles.summary: Singtel's Nxera is launching DC Tuas, its next data centre in Singapore, in early 2026. DC Tuas has already pre-sold about half of its capacity, indicating strong demand for AI data centers.

articles.title: SHANE BROWN: Living in the future with Gary the Roomba
articles.author: SHANE BROWN
articles.summary: The author bought a Roomba robot vacuum cleaner that promises to clean floors with intelligent mapping and precision navigation. The robot vacuum, named Gary, helps to keep the floors a little cleaner and reduces dust bunnies, thus making life marginally easier. The article also mentions a robotic litter box.

articles.title: PICTURES: Top supermarket reveals bigger store in North Yorkshire City
articles.author: York Press
articles.summary: M&S has officially opened a major extension and revamp of its store in Ripon.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC launched in India: Price, specifications ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone in India, expanding its 5G smartphone lineup. This new device joins the existing Storm Play 5G and Storm Lite 5G models in the company's product range.

articles.title: RollsPack launches new manufacturing facility in Huai'an, China
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: RollsPack has launched Rolls Technology, a new manufacturing facility in Huai'an, China. This facility aims to provide sustainable packaging solutions, featuring advanced machinery and clean-room environments to meet high global standards. Rolls Technology will serve customers in China, Australia, New Zealand, and other international markets, ensuring reliability in supply chains.

articles.title: Nubia Z70S Ultra review: Why does this phone exist?
articles.author: Tech Advisor
articles.summary: The Nubia Z70S Ultra is introduced as a phone with high-end specifications and mid-market pricing, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, a larger 6600mAh battery, and camera tweaks compared to the Nubia Z70 Ultra. It has a 6.85-inch AMOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate and runs on Android 15 with Nebula AIOS 1.5, starting at ¬£659 for the 12GB RAM and 256GB storage model.

articles.title: Flash Power Spray Mop review: ‚ÄòA powerful mop I can't stop using'
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: The Flash Power Spray Mop is a battery-powered mop with two jet sprays, designed for cleaning various floor types quickly. The mop comes as part of a starter kit with cleaning solution, disposable and reusable mop heads. It effectively lifts hair, dirt, and dust without over-saturating surfaces.

articles.title: See It To Believe It: 46 Products With Proof
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of newly available products from various companies, focusing on their unique features and benefits. These include Crest 3D Whitestrips for teeth whitening, Cosrx's snail mucin repairing essence for skin hydration, and Bior√© deep-cleansing pore strips for acne treatment. Additional product introductions include a game-changing AI-powered smartphone stabilizer and Cerave eye repair cream.

articles.title: Morrisons brings in new service at 300 stores with ¬£2 charge for shoppers
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched a new photo printing service, allowing customers to print photos and create personalized items like magnets, coasters, and phone cases. Photo printing kiosks will be installed in 300 Morrisons supermarkets, and customers can also order online with delivery options.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Launched With 5000mAh Battery, Qualcomm Chip‚ÄîCosts Under ‚Çπ10,000
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Lava has launched its new smartphone, the Blaze Dragon 5G, in India, priced at ‚Çπ9,999 (launch price of ‚Çπ8,999 with a bank offer). The phone features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset, a 6.745-inch HD+ display, 4GB of RAM (expandable up to 8GB), and runs on Android 15. It will be available on Amazon from August 1 in Golden Mist and Midnight Mist colours.

articles.title: Harry Styles Is Now Selling Sex Toys. Yes, You Read That Right
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: The brand 'Pleasing Yourself' launched a new collection. The collection includes a vibrator and a lube.

articles.title: WHMCS Alternative - PHP Domain & Hosting Shopping Cart with Multi-TLD Ajax Domain Checker
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart introduces a cost-effective alternative to WHMCS for domain name and web hosting shopping cart software. The new software features AJAX domain availability checking, one-page ordering, support for over 700 domain extensions, and online payment acceptance.

articles.title: Best face scrub for rejuvenated and refreshed skin: Our top 8 picks for you to buy
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: The article highlights several face scrubs from different companies, including Chemist At Play, Neutrogena, St. Ives, Forest Essentials, The Face Shop, Aveeno, and SKIN FOOD. These scrubs offer various benefits, such as exfoliation, pore cleansing, and skin rejuvenation, targeting different skin types and concerns with natural exfoliants and specialized formulations.

articles.title: Lava launches Blaze Dragon 5G powered by Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 and 120Hz display exclusively on Amazon
articles.author: Sourav
articles.summary: Lava International Limited has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone, its first offering under ‚Çπ10,000 with a Snapdragon chipset, exclusively on Amazon. The smartphone features the Snapdragon¬Æ 4 Gen 2 Mobile Platform, 4GB + 128GB with virtual RAM support, a 6.74-inch display, and a 50MP AI rear camera, running on Android 15.

articles.title: SA's first DIY mobile app launches with real-time stock in-app checkout and multilingual support
articles.author: Content Supplied
articles.summary: A new DIY mobile app has launched in South Africa, offering real-time stock updates and in-app self-checkout. The app supports five local languages and is designed for mobile users, even in low-connectivity areas. It also features loyalty rewards, a self-service refund portal, and the ability to check real-time product availability across multiple branches.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC launched in India: Price, specifications and features
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone in India, featuring a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset, 50MP camera, and a 5,000mAh battery. Priced at Rs. 9,999 for the 4GB RAM and 128GB storage variant, the phone will be available on Amazon starting August 1 and includes launch offers like bank discounts and exchange bonuses.

articles.title: Xiaomi expands smart home range with new advanced robot vacuums
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched two new robot vacuums, the H40 and S40, in Singapore. The H40, priced at S$319, features 10,000Pa suction power and a 4-litre dust bag, while the S40, a more budget-friendly option at S$229, offers similar suction and mopping capabilities with a smaller dust bin.

articles.title: Step Out of Your Skincare Comfort Zone
articles.author: Gma News
articles.summary: Dr. S. Wong's Sulfur Soap with Moisturizer combines sulfur and aloe vera for pimple treatment and skin moisturizing. The soap is clinically proven to clear pimples in as early as seven days, reduce pimple size in 24 hours, and effectively dry up pimples with regular use. It provides targeted acne care.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chip launched in India, priced at ‚Çπ9,999
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone, featuring a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC, HD+ 120Hz display, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, and a 5,000mAh battery. It is priced at ‚Çπ 9,999, with potential discounts during the Amazon Great Freedom Festival, and will be available on Amazon starting August 1st.

articles.title: Conrad Manila elevates spa offerings with new restorative treatments inspired by nature and conscious wellness
articles.author: MBrand
articles.summary: Conrad Manila introduces new spa offerings at Conrad Spa Manila featuring ISUN Skincare products. The new treatments include the Elevate Facial, a restorative facial using gua sha techniques; Transcend Massage, a relaxing massage using aromatherapy and gemstones; and Ormus Bath, a mineral-rich soak.

articles.title: Belfast mum hopes to shake up bath-time: ‚ÄòWhat I was looking for didn't exist, so I created my own'
articles.author: Sarah McKegney
articles.summary: Percy & Pop is introducing shampoo bars to Northern Ireland. The product aims to provide a 'fun and plastic-free' bath-time experience. The company created the product under two years ago.

articles.title: Google's 'Try it on' AI tool lets you try clothes virtually and track the best deals
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Google launched a new AI-powered feature. The feature lets users virtually try on clothes before buying them. Users can scroll through tried looks, save favorites, and share them with friends.

articles.title: Climate Action: A Shared Responsibility
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: A leading tech firm has launched a new AI system designed to revolutionize content creation. This AI offers enhanced natural language processing for contextually relevant and engaging text, streamlining content workflows and enabling personalized user experiences. The AI system is intended to augment human capabilities, improving efficiency for businesses relying on a constant stream of fresh content.

articles.title: ‚ö°Check Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Price, Specifications, Features and Sale
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles has launched the Lava Blaze Dragon 5G in India. This new device offers features such as a 120Hz display and fast-charging, and is powered by the Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Price, Specifications, Features and Sale Date Revealed, Know Everything About New Budget Smartphone by Lava Mobiles
articles.author: Kalpesh Sharma
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles launched the Lava Blaze Dragon 5G in India for INR 9,999 (INR 8,999 with launch discount). The smartphone features a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, 128GB storage, 4GB RAM, a 6.74-inch 120Hz display, a 50MP AI camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging. The sale begins on August 1, 2025.

articles.title: Pixel 10 Phone Lineup Revealed in Google Play Store Images
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch the Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 XL, and Pixel 10 Fold, powered by the Tensor G4 processor. Leaks suggest the Pixel 10 Pro will feature a brighter display and enhanced camera capabilities, with availability expected shortly after an August 20th launch event. The Pixel 10 Fold aims to compete with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold series, offering improvements in durability and software optimization.

articles.title: Lava launches Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 at ‚Çπ9,999
articles.author: ETTelecom
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone, featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, at a price of ‚Çπ9,999. The phone will be available on Amazon from August 1, 2025, and boasts a 6.74-inch display, 50MP AI rear camera, and runs on Stock Android 15.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Launched in India With 120Hz Display in Budget Segment; Check Price, Specifications, Features and Sale Date
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles has launched the Lava Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone in India, featuring a 120Hz display, Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, 4GB RAM (expandable with 4GB virtual RAM), 128GB storage, and Android 15. The phone includes a 50MP AI camera, 6.74-inch display, and 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging, and will be sold starting August 1, 2025.

articles.title: Google Unveils AI Try-On and Smarter Shopping Tools for a Virtual Dressing Room Experience
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Google is introducing new AI-powered features to enhance online shopping, including an advanced AI try-on feature and upgraded price-tracking tools. The AI try-on feature allows shoppers to virtually try on clothes using a full-body photo, while the upgraded price-tracking tools enable shoppers to set detailed price alerts for specific items.

articles.title: JAECOO J5 is set to make UAE debut with stylish, tech-forward urban SUV inspired by legendary design
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: OMODA\u0026JAECOO UAE announces the upcoming launch of a product in the UAE market. The product emphasizes design, technology, and comfort to appeal to consumer choice.

articles.title: The Hidden Power of Temporary Numbers for SMS and Online Signups
articles.author: satmin
articles.summary: SMS-MAN provides temporary phone numbers in over 100 countries, offering features like API access, pay-as-you-go pricing, and reusable or one-time numbers. SMS-MAN service is designed to allow users to automate registration, verification, and bypass regional restrictions.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy Z Flip7 and Galaxy Watch8 Series Globally Starting Today
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. announced the global availability of Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7, their latest foldable smartphones, and the new Galaxy Watch8 series. The Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 feature ultra-thin and light designs with intuitive intelligence and Galaxy AI integration. The Galaxy Watch8 series brings advanced sensor technology and AI-powered experiences for health tracking and offers features like the Antioxidant Index.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy Z Flip7 and Galaxy Watch8 Series Globally Starting Today
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics announced the global availability of the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 smartphones, along with the Galaxy Watch8 series. Pre-orders for the Galaxy Z foldable smartphones have exceeded targets across Europe. The Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 represent the next leap in smartphone innovation with ultra-thin, light designs and intuitive intelligence, while the Galaxy Watch8 series offers advanced health insights and all-day comfort.

articles.title: Google's 'Try it on' AI tool lets you try clothes virtually and track the best deals
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI-powered "Try it on" feature enabling users to virtually try on clothes via Google Search, Shopping, and Google Images. Additionally, Google introduced a personalized price tracking feature with customizable alerts and plans to launch an AI Mode that will curate fashion and decor ideas.

articles.title: From Prompts To Products: The Business Of No-Code AI Is Booming
articles.author: Kolawole Samuel Adebayo
articles.summary: Vertical AI, a no-code platform, allows users to fine-tune, deploy, and commercialize AI models and has rapidly grown to 30,000 users. The platform offers an intuitive interface for building custom models and monetizing them. Other platforms like Builder.ai and MindStudio are also gaining traction in the no-code AI space, enabling individuals to launch and monetize AI-powered tools for specific niches.

articles.title: McDonald's fans 'wanted to throw up' after trying McSpaghetti
articles.author: Ella Kipling
articles.summary: McDonald's offers the McSpaghetti in the Philippines and Indonesia, featuring spaghetti with sweet tomato sauce, hot dogs, and cheese. In India, the McAloo Tikki is a vegetarian burger with a spiced potato and pea patty, while in the Netherlands, the McKroket is a deep-fried croquette patty served in a burger bun.

articles.title: Fans order McDonald's on holiday and ask if dish is 'legal'
articles.author: Ella Kipling
articles.summary: McDonald's offers the McSpaghetti in the Philippines and Indonesia, featuring spaghetti with sweet tomato sauce, hot dogs, and cheese. In India, the McAloo Tikki is available which includes spiced potato and pea patty with tamarind-style sauce, onions, and tomatoes, and in the Netherlands the McKroket includes a deep-fried croquette patty served on a classic burger bun with mustard.

articles.title: 4 AI Prompts That Will Transform How You Create Presentations Forever
articles.author: Bernard Marr
articles.summary: AI tools such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Canva, Adobe Firefly, and Pitch are revolutionizing presentation creation by automating routine formatting tasks. These platforms package generative AI into products that are immediately useful for workplace productivity, offering features like text and image generation for creating presentations and slide decks more efficiently.

articles.title: Google launches AI try-on for clothes, teases generative shopping tools
articles.summary: Google is launching new AI-powered features for its shopping platform in the US, including an expanded virtual try-on for clothing, building upon their Doppl app with more personalized options.  The update includes enhanced price-tracking tools allowing users to specify size, color, and desired price for alerts.

articles.title: YouTube's AI Slop Is a Win for Alphabet. But¬†What About Us?
articles.summary: YouTube updated its policies to allow AI-generated videos on its platform, focusing on originality and value. Google plans to integrate its Veo3 video-generation tool into YouTube Shorts, facilitating the creation of AI-driven video content, which expands the options for creators on the platform.

articles.title: 43 Amazing Products Worth Your Attention
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Hanni introduced Shave Pillow, a showerless shave gel. Mielle launched rosemary mint strengthening edge gel. Capri Blue released Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner. Wet n Wild launched lipstick formulated with vitamins A and E and macadamia. Zep introduced foaming wall cleaner. Aerflo released System that lets you carbonate water ON THE GO! Hawaiian Tropic launched SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush.

articles.title: Ninja launches new Swirl ice cream gadget ‚Äì it will make ‚ÄòMr Whippy-style' soft-serve and frozen yoghurt at home
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi 13-in-1 Soft Serve & Ice Cream Maker, priced at ¬£349.99. This new device features a built-in nozzle for making soft serve ice cream, allowing users to customize ingredients and create treats suitable for various dietary needs. The machine offers six soft serve settings and six classic scoop settings for versatile ice cream and frozen yoghurt creations.

articles.title: Ultra-Tall Clocking Enabled on Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 for Enhanced Content Creation
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 introduces 'Ultra-Tall Clocking,' a technique that dynamically adjusts clock speeds beyond the standard maximum, offering benefits for content creation. This feature enhances performance in video editing, photography, graphic design, game development, and live streaming by intelligently allocating higher clock speeds to individual cores when needed. Rendering a 4K video in Adobe Premiere Rush can be up to 25% faster on a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 device with Ultra-Tall Clocking enabled.

articles.title: How to clean dirty white socks with 1 item ‚Äî not baking soda
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff Oxi Powder Stain Remover is a cleaning product that can be used to restore dirty white socks. The process involves soaking socks in warm water with the powder, then washing them in the machine with another scoop of the product.

articles.title: AI Agents - The Internet Is Being Rewritten - Survey Users Vs Brands?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: OpenAI aims to become the central interface for online activities using AI agents. Retail Wire is researching user and brand adaptation to this technology.

articles.title: 41 Travel Products To Make The Journey Easier
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights several new travel products, including Freshees disposable toothbrushes, a gel lint roller, a portable espresso maker, Tower 28's daily facial spray, a wireless transmitter and digital luggage scale and other innovative items designed to enhance travel convenience and comfort. These new products aim to solve common travel-related issues such as hygiene, clothing care, organization, and in-flight entertainment.

articles.title: OpenAI prepares to launch GPT-5 in August: Reports
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: A new AI system model is expected to launch this summer. This AI system incorporates distinct models and can perform different functions, differentiating it from single AI models.

articles.title: 35 Products That Solve Your Most Embarrassing Problems
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products and services designed to address everyday inconveniences and personal care needs. These include products like the Sock Dock, boob tape kit, reusable silicone nipple covers, rapid egg cooker, keloid reducer and various others for personal hygiene and grooming. There is also mention of health and home products such as allergy supplements and a mold remover.

articles.title: Samsung's latest foldables hit the UAE; e& rolls out offers at Dh250 per month
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Samsung launched its new Galaxy Z Fold7 in the UAE. Telecommunications provider e& is offering the device for as little as Dh250 per month, along with exclusive data bundles and AI-powered benefits. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is Samsung's slimmest foldable model to date.

articles.title: OpenAI prepares to launch GPT-5 in August: Report
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: OpenAI will position GPT-5 as an AI system. GPT-5 incorporates distinct models. GPT-5 will perform different functions; its launch was expected this summer.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G colour and storage variant tipped ahead of launch
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 FE, a new 'Fan Edition' smartphone. Leaks reveal that the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G will offer various color variants and storage options.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon launched with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor and 5,000mAh battery: Price, offers and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Lava launched the Blaze Dragon smartphone, featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor and a 5,000mAh battery. Priced under Rs 10,000, the Lava Blaze Dragon includes a 50MP AI camera and runs on stock Android 15.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 5G and Galaxy Z Flip 7 5G sale are now ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new generation of foldables in India, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 5G, Galaxy Z Flip 7 5G, and the Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE. These new foldables are known for their slimmer and lightweight design, powerful specifications, and new features.

articles.title: Particle Network launches Universal SDK as PARTI price breaks out 45%
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Particle Network introduced its Universal SDK. The SDK is designed for cross-chain decentralized application (dApp) development, marking a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: Burger King UK unveils new 'Barbie rescue' bundle for summer
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Burger King UK has launched a new bundle designed to help customers avoid BBQ mistakes during the summer.

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - July 25, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci is launching the Ophidia small belt bag, featuring the signature Web stripe and Double G emblem. The bag is made from soft GG Monogram coated fabric and costs $1450.

articles.title: SMS-MAN Temporary Mobile Numbers: The Smart Way to Secure Accounts Fast
articles.summary: SMS-MAN provides temporary mobile numbers for safely receiving SMS messages and bypassing phone number verification processes on various online platforms. The service offers wide global coverage, supports over 1000 platforms, and provides features such as real-time message delivery, private numbers, and developer API access to cater to various use cases, including creating social media accounts, running marketing campaigns, and testing registration flows.

articles.title: A Portland, Maine, Restaurant is Reopening Following a 7-Year Absence
articles.author: Joey
articles.summary: Dry Dock Restaurant in Portland, Maine, is set to reopen on Saturday, July 26, after renovations by the group behind Luke's Lobster. The revamped restaurant features extended outdoor decks for waterfront dining and a new kitchen, aiming to revitalize the dining experience.
